TopicTitle: Prototype I (The perfect Bomber/Plane) [With Drag Chute]

Articles.Content:
Ever since 0.15 was released, I have tried to make the most perfect plane that I could. It had to be able to withstand relatively hard landings, It had to have loads of fuel for long distances, really easy to handle with joystick and lastly I wanted it to be light enough to run on half throttle and drop bombs.

And after a lot of failures, I cracked it.

**(Note: The dihedral wing allows for the plane to self level 8))**

**Here is my result:**

If you download this craft then please send any pictures of you using it, in a reply so we can all share experiences ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif).

Ha ha I like how it\'s called \'Prototype I\' and in brackets 'the *perfect* bomber' ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) . I guess that makes sense when you think about the Kerbal\'s standards.

Lol but if only you seen how many prototype I, I went through lol
